itemDescription: TV and Radio science presenter and journalist

wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Jane Cruddas (born December 1983) is a television presenter, space journalist and author. She is an investigator on the television series Contact on Discovery Channel and Science Channel in the United States. She has an academic background in astrophysics and is the author of several books about space exploration.
